title: Boost Your Immune System: Guided Meditation - Purpose Fairy
author: E F; Luminita D Saviuc
description: Here is a beautiful guided meditation to boost your immune system, because, as you may already know, the stronger your immune system, the healthier you are.
cleaned_text: Your immune system is the defense mechanism your body uses to keep you safe from bacteria and viruses. The stronger the immune system, the healthier your body will be and [the happier your life will get.](http://www.purposefairy.com/80411/letting-go-to-be-happy-21-day-happiness-challenge/) Today's guided meditation is meant to boost your immune system, making sure that your body and immunity run smoothly, keeping you strong, healthy and in perfect shape. "Poor health is not caused by something you don't have; it's caused by disturbing something that you already have. Healthy is not something that you need to get, it's something you have already if you don't disturb it." ~ Dean Ornish Before you begin, remember to first, find a quiet place where you won't be disturbed for the next 45 minutes. Second, find a comfortable position to sit - it can be on a chair, crossed legged or on your knees, or lay down and when you're ready, press play.
